name: Carlos the Taco
description:
Buenos dias dear Amigo! My name is Taco Carlos and I need your help!
Some Gringo, kidnapped my bride right from the wedding! Only you can track them down and bring back my beloved!
The game "Taco Carlos" is a classic 2D platformer. Which takes place in sunny Mexico. You will need to fight enemies to get your bride back. The WASD buttons are used to control the character.
You have to get used to the role of a Mexican Taco to figure out what happened and unravel the tangle of history full of fun and groovy music.

You have to fight with various elements

Earth



ice


fire


Use elixirs to crush enemies!


    Features of the game
  • All graphics in the game are drawn by a professional artist
  • Wonderful music and sounds that create a special atmosphere
  • Author's animated comics
  • Fascinating plot
  • 120 animations made by hand
  • 1-2 hours of exciting game
